properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 3:01AM PST until January 9 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 9 to 12 feet expected. For the
Gale Watch, north winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and
seas 10 to 14 feet possible.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 11 AM this morning
to 3 AM PST Thursday. For the Gale Watch, from late Wednesday
night through Thursday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 AM PST THURSDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON
